isula.aco

Class AntColony<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • isula.aco.AntColony<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Class for components of a solution.

    public abstract class AntColony<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    A group of ants. As an abstract type, you need to define how to build individual ants through the createAnt() method.
    Author:
    Carlos G. Gavidia
